page.title: 19A DAY IN THE LIFE OF TRACY
page.content: I got up early on Sunday morning. Mum and Dad were still in bed. Mum got up and made our breakfast. Dad stayed in bed. I brushed my teeth and put on my Brownie uniform, which is a brown dress with a yellow tie. Brownies are all girls. Mum and I went to church on the bus. A bus is a large vehicle taking passengers to places for payment. We didn't have Sunday School that morning. Sunday School is where you learn about Jesus. The choir were there. The choir is a group of people who sing together. After church we went to my Grandma's before going home. After dinner we watched television. This is where pictures move on a screen. At night I had a bath. A bath is where you wash your hair and your body. I stayed up until 8 o'clock then I brushed my teeth and went to bed.
